_comment_dependencies: Dependency versions below are pinned for CVE mitigation. When upgrading, verify these versions still address current CVEs:
_comment_netty: netty.version=4.2.5.Final addresses CVE-2025-58056 and related Netty vulnerabilities
_comment_commons_lang3: commons-lang3.version=3.18.0 addresses CVE-2024-47554 in Apache Commons Lang
_comment_spring_framework: spring-framework.version=6.2.11 addresses multiple Spring Framework CVEs
_comment_spring_boot: spring.boot.version=3.4.5 addresses Spring Boot security vulnerabilities
